Name: Cloak and Dasher
About the game: Being an Infultaker is not just about getting rich. That's only about... I don't know... 60% of it? Being an Infultaker means getting in and getting out with style. Sure, anyone can loot an ancient tomb, but how many can claim to do it right under another thief's nose? The job is simple, a giant ruin has been unearthed by some rich company, and I'm going to bust in and grab the goods before their recovery drones can. Wait, if it's simple, that doesn't sound as impressive. It's actually hard... REALLY hard! Also impressive! OK I'm going to level with you, I didn't do a lot of research on this place ahead of time. All I know is that somewhere in the heart of these ruins lies some ancient treasure, and I, Cloak the Infultaker, am going to be the first to get to it! Fluid gameplay with simple controls: you'll be up and running immediately, but you'll need your skills to keep going! Blaze your way through over 100 handcrafted single-screen levels filled with dangers. Tons of unlockable levels, hats and achievements to reward you for keeping your skills sharp. Online leaderboards to let the world know you are the best Infiltaker! Level editor and level sharing, to be implemented further down the road.
